paper.title: Detecting asset price bubbles using deep learning
paper.abstract: In this paper, we employ deep learning techniques to detect financial asset bubbles by using observed call option prices. The proposed algorithm is widely applicable and model-independent. We test the accuracy of our methodology in numerical experiments within a wide range of models and apply it to market data of tech stocks in order to assess if asset price bubbles are present. Under a given condition on the pricing of call options under asset price bubbles, we are able to provide a theoretical foundation of our approach for positive and continuous stochastic asset price processes. When such a condition is not satisfied, we focus on local volatility models. To this purpose, we give a new necessary and sufficient condition for a process with time-dependent local volatility function to be a strict local martingale.

domain_result.justification: 该论文使用深度学习技术检测金融资产泡沫，主要基于观察到的看涨期权价格，这涉及到衍生品定价领域。同时，检测资产泡沫也是金融风险管理的一部分，因为它有助于识别潜在的市场风险。
